message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I'm extending this opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $13,500. This is a unique chance to secure an asset that is valued at $12,000 by you, but with additional incentives and benefits included in this offer. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
